description: Returns a description of a notebook instance lifecycle configuration. For information about notebook instance lifestyle configurations, see Step 2.1: (Optional) Customize a Notebook Instance.

parameters.name: NotebookInstanceLifecycleConfigName
parameters.description: The name of the lifecycle configuration to describe.

nested_items.name: NotebookInstanceLifecycleConfigArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the lifecycle configuration.

nested_items.name: NotebookInstanceLifecycleConfigName
nested_items.description: The name of the lifecycle configuration.

nested_items.name: OnCreate
nested_items.description: The shell script that runs only once, when you create a notebook instance.

nested_items.name: Content
nested_items.description: A base64-encoded string that contains a shell script for a notebook instance lifecycle configuration.

nested_items.name: OnStart
nested_items.description: The shell script that runs every time you start a notebook instance, including when you create the notebook instance.

nested_items.name: Content
nested_items.description: A base64-encoded string that contains a shell script for a notebook instance lifecycle configuration.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedTime
nested_items.description: A timestamp that tells when the lifecycle configuration was last modified.

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: A timestamp that tells when the lifecycle configuration was created.
